metadata.synopsis: When player picks up Runepowder time bomb, nearby gnome comments with a warning.

0.speaker: Thulla
0.text: Make sure you blow that thing up in the right place - Wulbren's counting on you.
0.context: NodeContext: Slightly concerned about the explosive but also earnest that Wulbren's will is enacted

1.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers
1.text: For Gaerdal's sake, be careful with that thing.
1.context: NodeContext: Warning; the player is handling a deadly explosive
